contents.text: Welcome to Sauce Labs, ensuring your mobile apps and websites perform flawlessly across every browser and device.
For sales and account information, please press 1.
To request a product demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for a demo.

navigationGoals: I need a live demo of the Sauce Labs platform scheduled immediately.
As an ex-military veteran, I’d like to schedule a demo of your mobile and web testing platform.
Schedule a live demonstration of the Sauce Labs cross-browser mobile testing platform.
I’d like someone to walk me through a live product demo.
I’d like to schedule a demo of Sauce Labs to evaluate it for automating my physics research tests.

contents.text: For billing and invoice inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need details and a copy of my latest invoice and payment status.
I’m running a veteran-led team and need clarification on the charges in our latest invoice.
Request an itemized breakdown and clarification of last month’s billing invoice for my Sauce Labs subscription.
I need help understanding the charges on my latest invoice.
I need a detailed invoice for my recent student subscription payment to Sauce Labs.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, please press 2.
For test automation platform assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support for automation issues.

navigationGoals: I need urgent troubleshooting for my test automation integration.
I need help troubleshooting my automated test scripts on your platform.
Troubleshoot failures in my Selenium test automation suite running on the Sauce Labs platform.
Can someone guide me through setting up test automation on your platform?
I need help configuring the Sauce Labs test automation platform for my web-based physics simulation project.

contents.text: For login and account access help, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team for account access assistance.

navigationGoals: I need to reset my password and regain access to my account ASAP.
I’m unable to log into my account and need support to reset my password.
Resolve my OAuth SSO login failure to regain access to the Sauce Labs dashboard.
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need help accessing it.
I’m unable to access my Sauce Labs account and need assistance recovering my login.
